title: Recognizing the Form
text: Can you identify the special form of the equation $$x^2-25=0$$? What's the relationship between the terms $$x^2$$ and 25?

title: Understanding Difference of Squares
text: How is the expression $$x^2-25$$ written as a difference of squares? Can you express $$25$$ as a power of another number?

title: Applying the Zero-Product Property
text: Once you express $$x^2-25$$ as a product of two binomials, what does the Zero-Product Property imply? What values make each factor equal to zero?

title: Solving the Factorized Equation
text: Write the equation $$x^2-25$$ in its factorized form and solve for x: $$\left(x+5\right) \left(x-5\right)=0$$. What values of $$x$$ satisfy this equation? Please enter your answer in the form a, $$b$$ with "a" being the positive root and "b" being the negative. Please include a space after the comma.
